title: pAri paDarnda rAgA:
sahitya:
pAri paDarnda taTAkam en manam pAshai seyalilE alaiginradE dinam


anupallavi

  AshaigaL ingOr Ayiram adai aDaiyAviDilO tuyaram adanAl


caraNam    uravu shuzhalgaLil uzhanrAi EdEdO udavA ANavattaip-payinrAi pOdAdO
paraveLiyil nilaikka muyaluvadun kaDamai oru vazhiyum ariyAdiruppadO maDamai
